companyName: Direxion Daily Aerospace & Defense Bull 3X Shares
description:
The investment seeks daily investment results, before fees and expenses, of 300% of the daily performance of the Dow Jones U.S. Select Aerospace & Defense Index.
 The fund invests at least 80% of its net assets (plus borrowing for investment purposes) in securities of the index, ETFs that track the index and other financial instruments that provide daily leveraged exposure to the index or ETFs that track the index. The index attempts to measure the performance of the aerospace and defense industry of the U.S. equity market. The fund is non-diversified.
